title: How Many Calories in a Quesadilla?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a quesadilla, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for cheese or chicken styles.
h1: How Many Calories in a Quesadilla?
assumptions: Standard 8-inch flour tortilla with 2 oz cheddar cheese, folded and griddled without added oil or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by tortilla size, cheese type, added ingredients, cooking method, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cheese quesadilla contains about 450 calories and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use corn tortilla instead of flour
Add 1 tbsp sour cream on top

faqs.q: How many calories is in a quesadilla with chicken?
faqs.a: A chicken quesadilla adds about 100 kcal, totaling around 550 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a quesadilla?
faqs.a: Approximately 40 g carbs per standard cheese quesadilla, mostly from the tortilla.

faqs.q: Is a quesadilla high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 800 mg sodium due to cheese and tortilla; opt for low-sodium versions to reduce.

faqs.q: How does baking vs. frying affect quesadilla calories?
faqs.a: Baking saves 50-100 kcal by avoiding added oil; frying increases fat content.

faqs.q: What makes a quesadilla lower calorie?
faqs.a: Use veggies, low-fat cheese, smaller tortilla, or whole wheat for fewer calories and more fiber.
